title: How your fave Bollywood couples met for the first time
text:
Whether it’s Anushka Sharma blowing a kiss at Virat Kohli or Ranveer Singh throwing loving glances at Deepika Padukone, we celeb junkies just can’t seem to get enough of the romantic shenanigans our celebrity couples. From romantic getaways to stolen moments of romance, they all feed our need to know more about the personal lives of our Bollywood royalty. And that includes juicy details of where these star love-struck duos first met. We did some research and unearthed some seriously throwback facts on their first encounters.
